entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6 except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 6 except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 17 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 5 except 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
